postCreateCommand: apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y openssh-server docker-compose && sudo service ssh start && curl -sL https://github.com/siemens/edgeshark/raw/main/deployments/wget/docker-compose.yaml | DOCKER_DEFAULT_PLATFORM=linux/amd64 docker compose -f - up -d && sed -i 's/^Port 2222/Port 22/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config && service ssh restart && echo 'KexAlgorithms diffie-hellman-group1-sha1,curve25519-sha256@libssh.org,ecdh-sha2-nistp256,ecdh-sha2-nistp384,ecdh-sha2-nistp521,diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256,diffie-hellman-group14-sha1' >> /etc/ssh/ssh_config && bash -c '$(curl -sL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/asadarafat/topoViewer/refs/heads/development/docs/quickstart/quick-deploy.sh)'
